title.romaji: Luo Xiaohei Zhan Ji: Fan Wai

description:
Specials of Luo Xiaohei Zhan Ji that have new animation but do not have a standard episode number.

1) Ep 8.5, an official parody episode.
2) Music video that aired between Ep 10 and Ep 11.
3) Music video that aired between Ep 24 and Ep 25.
4) Music video that aired after Ep 28
